sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>fire</radical> <radical>door</radical> is a door that leads to something full of fire. That thing is a <kanji>furnace</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Open the fire door and feel the heat of the <kanji>furnace</kanji>. Hot!
readingMnemonic: You're using the <kanji>furnace</kanji> to melt tar to put on the <reading>ro</reading>ad (<ja>ろ</ja>).
readingInfo: Smell the tar baking from the furnace. Feel the heat from the furnace. Fix the road, while you're at it.
